Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ActionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionControllerTest.ActionControllerStub, TurnControllerTest.ActionControllerStub
public class ActionController
extends java.lang.Object
ActionController class calls model's method after receiving right turn's actions from TurnController.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionController

      public ActionController​(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Constructor ActionController creates a new ActionController instance.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - of type GameBoard - GameBoard reference.

  • Method Details

    • startAction

      public boolean startAction​(Worker currentWorker)
      Method startAction checks if selected worker is blocked or in a wrong turn phase.
      Parameters:
      currentWorker - of type Worker - the value stored identifying selected worker if assigned.
      Returns:
      boolean true if selection is correct, false otherwise.

    • endAction

      public boolean endAction()
      Method endAction checks if player can end turn.
      Returns:
      boolean true if result is positive, false otherwise.

    • readMessage

      public boolean readMessage​(SelectMoveAction action)
      Method readMessage notifies the player with the moves his worker can make.
      Parameters:
      action - of type SelectMoveAction - the action received from the client.
      Returns:
      boolean false if the worker is blocked, or it isn't the correct phase of turn or gameBoard is null, true otherwise.

    • selectForceWorkerReadMessage

      private boolean selectForceWorkerReadMessage()
      Method selectForceWorkerReadMessage notify the player with the spaces where Charon can use his power.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the listener has been fired properly, false if it has not or it is not the correct phase or if the active worker is not Charon.

    • readMessage

      public boolean readMessage​(SelectBuildAction action)
      Method readMessage notifies the player with a list of spaces in which his worker can build.
      Parameters:
      action - of type SelectBuildAction - action received from the client.
      Returns:
      boolean false if it isn't the correct phase of the turn or gameBoard is null, true otherwise.

    • readMessage

      public boolean readMessage​(SelectBuildAction action, Space unmovedWorkerPosition)
      Method readMessage notifies the player with a list of spaces where Ares can use his power.
      Parameters:
      action - of type SelectBuildAction - the action which must be Action.SELECT_REMOVE.
      unmovedWorkerPosition - of type Space - the position of the unmoved worker, which must be the same color as the current worker.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the notification is successful, false if it is not a SELECT_REMOVE action or current worker is not ares or the current phase is not SELECT_REMOVE action.

    • readMessage

      public boolean readMessage​(MoveAction action)
      Method readMessage moves the worker into the space received.
      Parameters:
      action - of type MoveAction - the action received from teh server.
      Returns:
      boolean false if it isn't the correct phase or if the worker cannot move into this space, true otherwise.

    • readMessage

      public boolean readMessage​(BuildAction action)
      Method readMessage builds the worker into the space received.
      Parameters:
      action - of type BuildAction - action received from teh server.
      Returns:
      boolean false if it isn't the correct phase or if the worker cannot build into this space, true otherwise.

    • readMessage

      public boolean readMessage​(BuildAction action, Space unmovedWorkerPosition)
      Method readMessage checks if REMOVELEVEL action is permitted.
      Parameters:
      action - of type BuildAction - the action from the client.
      unmovedWorkerPosition - of type Space - the position of the inactive worker.
      Returns:
      boolean true if correct, false otherwise.

    • forceWorkerReadMessage

      public boolean forceWorkerReadMessage​(MoveAction action)
      Method readMessage forces the worker from the space received with Charon power.
      Parameters:
      action - of type MoveAction - the action received from the server.
      Returns:
      boolean true if Charon forced the worker, false otherwise.

    • getWorker

      public Worker getWorker()
      Method getWorker returns the worker of this ActionController object.
      Returns:
      the worker (type Worker) of this ActionController object.

    • getPhase

      public int getPhase()
      Method getPhase returns the phase of this ActionController object.
      Returns:
      the phase (type int) of this ActionController object.
